abstractText: This method describes the process of extracting DNA from filtered eDNA samples, using a phenol-chloroform approach.This method was modified by Kim Parsons (NWFSC) from the following: Renshaw M. A. et al. (2015). The room temperature preservation of filtered environmental DNA samples and assimilation into a phenol-chloroform-isoamyl alcohol DNA extraction. Mol. Ecol. Resources 15:168-176.
title: Extraction of filtered eDNA using phenol-chloroform method v1.0
